titles.title: Lord, I Love You, I Earnestly Seek You

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord, I love You, I earnestly seek You.
Only You can reign in my heart. (Repeat.)
You are the One who saved my soul.
You are the One who makes me whole.
You are the Lord of my life, and I exalt You.
You shelter me in Your mighty hand.
You are the Rock on which I stand.
You are the Lord, You are the one.
